price: na magpalit Kami ng higit na mabuti kaysa sa kanila, at Kami ay hindi mauunahan.”
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
